data.title: Denominational Church in Miami, FL
data.meta_description: When somebody comes to our church, we want lives to be impacted and made better because they are a part of Metro. Check out our services streamed live online!
data.text:
We are a relationship-minded church located in the beautiful city of Miami, Fl. Join us for a Sunday service and start doing life together!

We’d love to see you this Sunday! Come worship with us at 10am and 12pm at our Doral Campus and 11am at our Dadeland Campus.

Can’t make it to church? We’ll bring it to you! Catch our 10 am and 12 pm services live on Facebook, Youtube, and right here on our website.

Pastors Steve and Mary Alessi started Metro Life Church with the purpose to impact everyday life through relationship. They are committed to leading the church by example through Biblical principles.

Connect Groups meet regularly throughout South Florida for Bible study, as well as to promote fellowship and build lifelong relationships. We have groups catered to women, men, couples, and young adults.

Our STEPS program is designed to help you identify the next steps to take in your walk, in order to help you get connected at Metro Life Church.

We believe in the power of worship to bring us closer to the throne of God! Join Metro Life Worship live on Sunday mornings or listen any day of the week on your favorite music streaming app.

Metro Kids is an interactive, high-energy kids’ ministry designed with every child in mind! We teach kids about God while taking care of their every need so that their parents can enjoy the main service with peace of mind.

We would love to get to know you! Subscribe below so that we can send you an email with our upcoming events!
